text: Leopold Anthony Skeete (born 3 August 1949) is an English former professional footballer who played as a forward. Born in Liverpool, Skeete played non- League football for Burscough and Ellesmere Port Town before signing for Rochdale in April 1973. He played 40 Football League games for Rochdale, scoring 14 goals, before returning to non-League football with Mossley in 1975, serving as caretaker manager in January 1978.Managers Mossley A.F.C. He signed for Runcorn in 1982 for £3,500, and then Altrincham in 1983,1983–84 players Altrincham F.C. before retiring in 1984. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:English footballers Category:Burscough F.C. players Category:Ellesmere Port Town F.C. players Category:Rochdale A.F.C. players Category:Mossley A.F.C. players Category:Runcorn F.C.
